mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARDINFO( BOARDSEQ, ID, BOARDTITLE, BOARDCONTENT, HITCOUNT, indate ) VALUES ( BOARDSEQ.nextval, #{id}, #{boardtitle}, #{boardcontent}, '0', sysdate )
INSERT INTO filesystem( fileseq, boardseq, org_name, sav_name, indate ) VALUES ( fileseq.nextval, (select max(boardseq) from boardinfo), #{orgname}, #{savname}, sysdate )
mapper.select: select boardseq, id, boardtitle, boardcontent, hitcount, indate from boardinfo order by indate desc
select boardseq, id, boardtitle, boardcontent, hitcount, indate from boardinfo where boardseq=#{boardseq}
select fileseq, boardseq, org_name orgname, sav_name savname, indate from filesystem where boardseq=#{boardseq}
mapper.update: update boardinfo set hitcount=hitcount+1 where boardseq = #{boardseq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMMENTS( COMMENTSSEQ, BOARDSEQ, ID, COMMENTS, INDATE ) VALUES ( commentseq.nextval, #{boardseq}, #{id}, #{comments}, sysdate )
mapper.select: select COMMENTSSEQ, BOARDSEQ, ID, COMMENTS, INDATE, PARENTSEQ, TARGETID from comments where boardseq = #{boardseq} order by commentsseq
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMMENTS( COMMENTSSEQ, BOARDSEQ, ID, COMMENTS, INDATE, PARENTSEQ, TARGETID ) VALUES ( commentseq.nextval, #{boardseq}, #{id}, #{comments}, sysdate, #{parentseq}, #{targetid} )
mapper.update: update comments set comments = #{comments}, id = #{id} where commentsseq = #{commentsseq}
